ComicInfo.Title: Webs
ComicInfo.Summary: A security firm advertises a demonstration of a new miracle fabric boasted to be stronger than Spider-Man's webbing. Peter Parker attends the event featuring Simon Williams as the demonstrator. Mauler crashes the party and things are not as they seem.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:50:53. [Issue ID 38065]
